name: Riverdi STM32H7 Embedded 10.1”
description: STM32 Embedded 10.1” display is all-in-one complete and open-platform solution being able to independently handle the visual layer of devices with the need for high computing performance. The 10.1-inch STM32 Embedded Displays series are industrial-quality LCD-TFT solutions based on the STM32H757XIH6 microcontroller. It has been designed in a way that allows to meet most of the hardware and programming challenges faced by engineers, including access to all interfaces.
getStartedInstructions:
1. Connect a 6-48V power supply to the POWER header on the board using the supplied cable. 
2. Connect a debug probe to the SWD header using the supplied cable.
 3. Install [STM32 CubeIDE](https://www.st.com/en/development-tools/stm32cubeide.html)
4. Open STM32CubeIDE and import project:` File => Open Projects from File System... => Directory => Select the "STM32CubeIde" folder => Finish`
5. Click the Run button to flash the project
